# requirements.txt can be used to replicate the developer's build environment
# setup.py lists a separate set of requirements that are looser to simplify
# installation
ruffus == 2.7.0
Pillow == 5.2.0
reportlab == 3.4.0
PyPDF2 == 1.26.0
img2pdf == 0.2.4
cffi == 1.11.5
PyMuPDF == 1.12.5
defusedxml == 0.5.0
